DOC.brief_summary: The objective prospective randomize control study evaluate efficacy safety low dose amitriptyline ( 5 mg ) management chronic neck pain .
DOC.brief_title: Low Doses Amitriptyline & Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Patients chronic neck pain , last since least 3 month , recruit pain clinic . After verification inclusion exclusion criterion , patient consent enter study assign randomly one follow group : 1-Amitriptyline 5 mg 2 month 2- placebo 2 month . Co-morbidities painful condition note , clinical evaluation patient perform ; pain assess accord Visual Analog Scale , anxiety , depression , insomnia disability evaluate adapted score ( Bergen insomnia scale , neck pain disability score , neck pain diary & anxiety depression score ) . Patients follow 1 , 2 3 month outcome measure assess .
